name: Days Inn - Altamonte Springs

reviews.title: Motel now
reviews.text: The hotel changed name to Days Inn recently. We were given a room that has a lasting mildew smell and no bath-tub. The room was obviously old and worn. The hotel was experiencing some change of management during our stay and the check-in and check-out processes were very tedious.

aka: Days Inn - Altamonte Springs Hotel Altamonte Springs
